headline: Zebra Technologies (ZBRA): Margin Expansion Challenges Bearish Narratives as Profit Surges 34.6%
summary: Zebra Technologies (ZBRA) posted a notable jump in profitability this year, with profit margins rising to 9.7% from 8.2% last year and EPS climbing 34.6% over the past twelve months. The share price, sitting at $270.77, currently trades below the estimated fair value of $348.61. However, the company's price-to-earnings multiple of 26.8x is above the US Electronic industry average of 25.1x. Investors are likely to focus on the improved margins and sustained earnings momentum as clear...

headline: Zebra Technologies (ZBRA): Exploring Valuation After Q3 Beat and Sharp Share Price Drop
summary: Zebra Technologies (ZBRA) delivered third-quarter results that topped expectations and raised its sales outlook for the rest of the year. The company highlighted growth from recent acquisitions and innovation in AI-enabled products. Despite these positives, the stock fell more than 14% following the report as investors focused on contracting profit margins and only modest organic growth. This has raised questions about market sentiment toward the company’s longer-term trajectory. See our...
